title: Chapter 1278 - I’Ll Grant You Death
volume_title: His Sword Takes Aim A The Three Thousand Worlds Of The Stars, Suppressing Foes Both Past And Present
body:
Chapter 1278 - I’Ll Grant You Death

As he said this, Feng Xingya’s smile turned extraordinarily excited yet sinister.

With hints of madness.

Su Yi was stunned, but a moment later, he realized what was happening here. He’s just another madman whose Mad Demon Bloodline has ruined his brain.

The Blue Luan Spirit Race had numerous unique bloodlines.

Of them, the Mad Demon Bloodline was the most distinct. It bequeathed top-notch talent, but at the same time, those with this bloodline were extremely prone to problems with their heart and their mental state.

They tended to develop unusual eccentricities, like a lust for blood, combat, gambling, or alternatively, extreme slothfulness…

For instance, the Blue Luan old-timer the Temple Master had defeated was a complete gambling maniac.

There was no doubt about it. Feng Xingya was a combat maniac!

There was no need to waste time talking to a madman like him.

Su Yi rose into the air, and the Dark and Gold Fortune Vine silently appeared in his grip as he said flatly, “Come on, then. I’ll grant you death.”

Feng Xingya’s grin broadened, and his eyes surged with murderous intent.

He took a step forward.

Boom!
